bug.question: I have six legs and crawl. I like to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I change into a butterfly!
🌱 I munch on plants in your garden.
🌈 I come in many colors.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I can sting you if I'm scared. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I buzz around flowers looking for nectar.
🏘️ I live with all my friends.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I have long legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🌿 I can jump really high.
🦗 People think I'm lucky.

bug.question: I am a little bug that glows in the dark. You can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I light up the night.
✨ I twinkle in the sky.
🪲 I have a light on my bottom.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. People say I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have spots all over me.
🐞 Farmers love when I am around
❤️ I am small and round

bug.question: I carry food in a line. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am tiny.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏠 I live underground with lots of friends.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch bugs. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build my own home.
🕷️ I have more legs than you!
🪰 I eat flies and other bugs.

bug.question: I fly at night and drink blood. I make you itchy. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I make a buzzing sound near your ear.
🩹 You might need cream for my bite.
🌑 I like to come out when it's dark.

bug.question: I can be green, brown or black and blend in with leaves. I can be hard to spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I look just like a stick.
👣 If you look closely, you'll see my legs
🌳 I like to sit on trees

bug.question: I start as a larva, then hide in a chrysalis, and come out with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am beautiful and colorful.
🐛 First, I'm a hungry caterpillar.
🏡 I spend time in a chrysalis.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🌱 I need water and sunshine to grow.
🥗 You can find me in a salad.

plant.question: I have a long brown stem and colorful petals. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift.
🌻 I need sunshine to bloom.
🌷 I can be red, yellow, pink, or many other colors.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and am red, green, or yellow. You can take a bite out of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked to eat me.
🥧 You can make pie out of me.
🌳 I grow in an orchard.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make furniture from me.
🍂 My leaves fall down in the autumn.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I'm long and orange and grow under the ground. Bugs Bunny loves to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 I am good for your eyes.
🥣 You can eat me raw or cooked in a soup.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem, and beautiful flowers. Be careful when you hold me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a symbol of love.
🥀 I can be many different colors.
🌵 I have thorns to protect myself.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when heated. You like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a cob!
🎬 I'm good with a movie
🔥 I need heat to transform

plant.question: I grow in bunches on a vine, and can be green or purple. Some people make juice and wine from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in a vineyard.
🍷 I can be fermented to make an adult beverage.
🥤 You can make a sweet drink out of me.

plant.question: I have prickly skin and a sweet inside. I grow in warm places and am very juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 Spongebob lives in a house that looks like me!
🍹 I taste great in a smoothie!
🌴 I grow best in tropical climates.

plant.question: I am a seed that is used to make bread. Farmers grow fields of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am a grain
🍞 I can be ground up to make flour
🚜 I am harvested with big machines.
